A distracted admin generated two RSA keys but reused the same prime. Can you recover the private key and decrypt this message? 513134719902488052901276991422114905681238079570908788895596815892586060116576727187774650669256966189755902866350016107260474481655742964422771473633514185970912985446590190834497523601920182302091974163988293503448047530999084099

The flag format is flag{...}
n=534984514435935410607484569892143587493185417781394507785057702685705724861650116433043502885972854209731666793045138381006236279189218083535452458481420440917453027682628735098226314118285098970133294169621761120993668477323210361, e=516931130443911596373357842032332699679124991444232805719748674989941056397975436524069380753040910728359522958947916737739609600542166233170645010698494042546270529787910337441367001387189574356596938772070407383602797504295537289

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{u055rz7f}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 513134719902488052901276991422114905681238079570908788895596815892586060116576727187774650669256966189755902866350016107260474481655742964422771473633514185970912985446590190834497523601920182302091974163988293503448047530999084099
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=534984514435935410607484569892143587493185417781394507785057702685705724861650116433043502885972854209731666793045138381006236279189218083535452458481420440917453027682628735098226314118285098970133294169621761120993668477323210361, e=516931130443911596373357842032332699679124991444232805719748674989941056397975436524069380753040910728359522958947916737739609600542166233170645010698494042546270529787910337441367001387189574356596938772070407383602797504295537289
extra_info: p=23129732260359941542344403514038737936200394220212485537718213424718512793406844367317064454850764957051970913204981, q=23129732260359941542344403514038737936200394220212485537718213424718512793406844367317064454850764957051970913204981, Ï†(n)=534984514435935410607484569892143587493185417781394507785057702685705724861650116433043502885972854209731666793045092121541715559306133394728424381005548040129012602711553298671376877092698285281398660040712059591079564535496800400
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
